Class StatisticsTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.persistit.Task
      • com.persistit.StatisticsTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class StatisticsTask
extends Task
    Task that reports, either once or periodically, various runtime statistics.

    peter
